content: Investments ETF PFF Panel 3 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by Ponselvan AntoAsked on 02 Mar 2019What is the best way to buy ETF or shares? Would you recommend FSM? What would be your choice amongst dbs/ocbc/standardCharter?2 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (2)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Dawn FionaLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 03 Mar 2019FSMOne is great for SG and HK investments.DBS / OCBC / SC  - depends on the fees and promotions. Do note that SC has lower fees but is custodian of your shares.0 comments0

Nicholes Wong, Diploma in Business Management at Nanyang PolytechnicLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 03 Mar 2019Just choose the broker u prefer with low fees. FSMone is pretty good for SG or HK stocks/etfs but really bad for US stocks due to fees. DBS is good for SG and Standard Charter is good for overseas.0 comments0
